name: song-library-test-automation
description: Playwright test automation framework with POM for Song Library application

scripts.full-report: npx playwright test & npx allure generate test-results/allure-results -o test-results/allure-report && npx ts-node helpers/UnifiedReportGenerator.ts && start test-results/unified-reports/latest.html && npx allure open test-results/allure-report
scripts.chrome-report: npx playwright test --project=chromium && npx allure generate test-results/allure-results -o test-results/allure-report && npx ts-node helpers/UnifiedReportGenerator.ts && start test-results/unified-reports/latest.html && npx allure open test-results/allure-report
scripts.smoke-report: npx playwright test --grep @smoke --project=chromium && npx allure generate test-results/allure-results -o test-results/allure-report && npx ts-node helpers/UnifiedReportGenerator.ts && start test-results/unified-reports/latest.html
scripts.test:allure-report: subst Q: "C:\Users\tboyl\Desktop\QA Test" && npx allure generate Q:\test-results\allure-results -o Q:\test-results\allure-report --clean
scripts.test:allure-serve: subst Q: "C:\Users\tboyl\Desktop\QA Test" && npx allure serve Q:\test-results\allure-results

author: QA Team
